EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Invite 3 - EN - (webinar format)
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now for Tricentis Accelerate 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Accelerate - October 22nd, 2015 Novomatic Forum, Vienna 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. Followed by buffet & networking
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We would like to invite you to Tricentis Accelerate 2015 <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>. Join us for an inspiring day full of seminars, workshops, and networking.
Register now <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> to secure your free ticket! The topic of this year's conference is “Testing in the digital enterprise age“.
We hope you will enjoy chatting with our test automation experts about test automation, DevOps, continuous testing, and all of the challenges and opportunities the industry landscape provides.
You can also now find the event program <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/#program> online. We look forward to meeting you in Vienna!
Best regards, The Tricentis Events Team
PS: Highlights from Accelerate 2014 can be found here <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/accelerate-2014/>.
